function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of communication and collaboration between nurses and physicians in a civil environment","Impact":"Reduced efficiency in crisis management and potential for miscommunication in the healthcare setting","Mitigation":"Establish formal communication protocols and encourage open dialogue between nurses and physicians","Technologies":"Communication platforms like WhatsApp groups and open phone lines","People":"Nurses, physicians, hospital managers","Owner":"Hospital managers, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate material support for healthcare workers","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases and lack of resources for prevention","Mitigation":"Provide sufficient disinfectants, preventive supplies, transportation, accommodation, and financial rewards for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, disinfectant technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital managers","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Weakness in hospital services during a crisis","Impact":"Inability to effectively handle complex and fast-changing situations, leading to potential healthcare system overload","Mitigation":"Invest in strengthening hospital services and streamline procedures for easier workflow during a pandemic","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, workflow optimization tools","People":"Hospital managers, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Hospital managers, healthcare administrators"}]}
